title: The Glass Vein
description: Miners in Ridge Section 4 have struck an unusual vein — not ore, but a substance that looks and feels like glass and resonates faintly when spoken to. Mining Foreman Ness has halted the dig and wants the anomaly assessed before proceeding.

turns.narrative: The vein runs thirty feet into the rock face, glowing a faint amber. Miners nearby report dreaming vividly for the first time in years. One miner claims he spoke to his dead father. Foreman Ness is pragmatic — either this has value or it's dangerous, and he needs to know which.
turns.choice_a: Touch the vein directly to assess its properties
turns.consequence_a: An immediate, overwhelming sensation of interconnectedness fills you — not frightening but deeply alien. You understand instinctively that this material responds to intent.
turns.choice_b: Have Alchemist Tev analyse a surface sample without anyone touching the intact vein
turns.consequence_b: Tev identifies Resonant Crystal — a Pre-Scourge alchemical substrate used in communication and memory-storage devices.

turns.narrative: Resonant Crystal has both commercial and historical value, but it affects people's dreams and emotional states through proximity. The miners are not in danger but extended exposure may be unhealthy.
turns.choice_a: Recommend Ness continue mining the crystal under controlled conditions for the Academic Quarter
turns.consequence_a: Tev supervises. Several carefully harvested fragments are secured for study.
turns.choice_b: Recommend Ness seal the vein and restrict access pending full research
turns.consequence_b: Ness seals off the section. The anomaly is documented for future research under safer conditions.

turns.narrative: The miners who experienced the dreams need to be accounted for.
turns.choice_a: Arrange for them to speak formally with an Academic Quarter researcher about their experiences
turns.consequence_a: Valuable anecdotal data is gathered. Three miners volunteer for continued study.
turns.choice_b: Simply ensure they are rotated out of Section 4 and monitored for well-being
turns.consequence_b: All affected miners are moved to unaffected sections. No lasting effects are reported.

crystal_studied.description: Resonant Crystal harvested and sent for academic study.

vein_sealed.description: Crystal vein sealed pending future research.

risk_matrix.critical_failure: The attempt failed quietly. The situation remains unresolved.

conclusion: Resonant Crystal harvested and sent for academic study.
